The aim of this notebook is to explore the prediction accuracy
of different type of essentiality scores on drug sensitivity.

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
```


```{r}
res <- map_dfr(c(1:365), .f = function(x){
  
  # drug <- paste("~/cluster_scratch/forward_modelling/ctrp_pearson/", x, ".RData", sep = "")
    drug <- paste("~/cluster_scratch/forward_modelling/ctrp_spearman/drug_", x, ".RData", sep = "")
  load(drug)
  df <- bind_cols(ceres= ceres_perf, ces= ces1_perf, demeter2= demeter2_perf, exp= exp_perf, drug= x)
  
})

```


```{r}
res1 <- res %>% 
  group_by(drug) %>% 
  summarise_all(.funs = median) 

load("~/cluster_scratch/glmnet_modelling_cluster/input.RData")
res2 <- res1 %>% 
  select(-drug) %>% 
  bind_cols(data) %>% 
  mutate(sample_size= map_int(.x=sensitivity, 
                              .f=function(x){sum(x %>% pull(DepMap_ID) %in% ces1$DepMap_ID)})) %>%
  select(-target, -sensitivity) %>% 
  bind_cols(
    res %>% 
      select(ces,drug) %>%
      group_by(drug) %>% 
      summarize(ces_variance= var(ces)) %>% 
      ungroup() %>% 
      arrange(drug) %>% 
      select(-drug)
  ) %>% 
  mutate(drug_pair= str_detect(cpd_smiles, "\\."))
  

# res1 %>%   
#   select(-drug)%>%   
#   pivot_longer(cols = 1:4,names_to= "predictor", values_to= "spearman_cor") %>% 
#   group_by(predictor) %>% 
#   summarise(mean_cor= mean(spearman_cor), median_cor= median(spearman_cor))

res2 %>% filter(!drug_pair) %>% 
  select_at(c(1:4)) %>% 
  summary()

res2 %>% arrange(desc(ces))
```


```{r,fig.width=3,fig.height=2}
fig <- res2 %>%
  filter(!drug_pair) %>% 
  select_at(c(1:4)) %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = 1:4,names_to= "predictor", values_to= "spearman_cor") %>%
  ggplot(aes(x= predictor , y= spearman_cor ))+
  geom_boxplot(outlier.size = 0.2)+
  theme_classic()+
  xlab("")+
  ylab("Accuracy (Spearman Cor)")+
  scale_x_discrete(labels = c("CERES", "CES", "DEMETER2","EXP"))+
  coord_flip()
fig

ggsave(fig, filename = "~/cluster_wrk/drug_moa/sensitivity_fitting/fig_res/fig 2E.pdf",width = 3,height = 2)

ggsave(fig, filename = "~/cluster_wrk/drug_moa/sensitivity_fitting/fig_res/fig 2E.tiff",width = 3,height = 2)
```

Combine the gdsc id back to compare with the ctrp
```{r}
load("~/cluster_scratch/gdsc/gdsc.RData")
gdsc_df <- gdsc_df %>% 
  bind_cols(res_gdsc1 %>% select(ces)) %>% 
  mutate(sample_size= map_int(sensitivity, .f=
                                function(x){
                                  length(intersect( x$DepMap_ID,ces1$DepMap_ID)) 
                                  
                                })) %>% 
  select(- sensitivity, -target)

gdsc_drug_list <- read_csv("~/cluster_scratch/gdsc/Drug_list.csv")

id_mapping_gdsc <- read_tsv("~/cluster_scratch/gdsc/pubchem_cid_to_smiles.txt",
                       col_names = c("PubCHEM", "smiles"),col_types = "cc")
id_mapping_ctrp <- read_csv("~/cluster_scratch/ctrp/ctrpv2_smiles.csv",
                       col_types = "ccc")

comparison <- id_mapping %>% 
  inner_join(gdsc_drug_list %>% mutate(PubCHEM= as.character(PubCHEM))) %>% 
  inner_join(gdsc_df ,by= c("drug_id"= "DRUG_ID")) %>% 
  inner_join(
    y= res2 %>% 
      inner_join(id_mapping_ctrp , by= c("broad_cpd_id")) %>%
      select(broad_cpd_id,ces, cid, sample_size),
    by= c("PubCHEM"="cid"))
```

```{r}
comparison %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = ces.x, y = ces.y))+
  geom_point()

cor(comparison$ces.x, comparison$ces.y,method = "pearson")
cor(comparison$ces.x, comparison$ces.y,method = "spearman")

tmp <- comparison %>% 
  mutate(sample_size_diff= abs(sample_size.x-sample_size.y)) %>% 
  filter(sample_size_diff < 100) 
tmp %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = ces.x, y = ces.y))+
  geom_point()+
  theme_classic()+
  xlab("Performance GDSC")+
  ylab("Performance CTRP")+
  ggtitle("Spearman COR 0.57")

cor(tmp$ces.x, tmp$ces.y,method = "pearson")
cor.test(tmp$ces.x, tmp$ces.y,method = "spearman")
```

```{r,fig.width=2.5, fig.height=2.5}
tmp %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = ces.x, y = ces.y))+
  geom_point()+
  theme_classic()+
  xlab("Performance GDSC")+
  ylab("Performance CTRP")+
  ggtitle("spearman cor=0.57, 
          p= 0.027")
```
